overview: Jimmy Tweaker is a stoned drug addict who is too high to be kept alive in the eyes of a specialized agent and the men he works for. But before this agent takes him down, he must find the source of providence for the multifarious selection of drugs-The Stash. As an undercover druggie, he befriends Jimmy in a wild adventure through space and time. Jimmy doesn't know of the agent's ulterior motives, though.
title: The Life of a Pig
